description: A slab of golden chicken schnitzel paired with a refreshing cabbage, spinach and apple slaw, drizzled with dressing: it's the tasty flavour pairing you didn't know you needed.
name: Chicken Schnitzel With Apple Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide cabbage mixture among plates and drizzle with dressing. Arrange schnitzel on top and serve with mayonnaise.
